tidbits.title: Crossroads of Civilizations
tidbits.description: Turkey has been a historical crossroads for various civilizations, showcasing remnants of Greek, Roman, Byzantine, and Ottoman empires in its architecture and landmarks.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country boasts a rich cultural heritage seen in its diverse traditions, cuisine, music, and the UNESCO-listed sites like Hagia Sophia and the ancient city of Ephesus.

tidbits.title: Natural Wonders
tidbits.description: Turkey offers diverse landscapes, from the stunning coastline along the Aegean and Mediterranean Seas to the unique landscapes of Cappadocia and Pamukkale.
